plan(1,init, sentence(true,move(print("-------------")),'','' ))
plan(2,init, sentence(true,move(print("ioRobot: A robot performs a move in reactive way (usercmd)")),'','' ))
plan(3,init, sentence(true,move(print("The moves can be stopped by pressing a button on the http GUI")),'','' ))
plan(4,init, sentence(true,move(print("-------------")),'','' ))
plan(5,init, sentence(true,move(print("---- FINE ----")),'','' ))
plan(6,init, sentence(true,repeatplan(0) ,'','' ))
